text: Distal sensory impairment - Foot dorsiflexor weakness - Hammertoe - Heterogeneous - Hypertrophic nerve changes - Hyporeflexia - Increased CSF protein - Infantile onset - Kyphoscoliosis - Motor delay - Muscular hypotonia - Onion bulb formation - Pes cavus - Segmental peripheral demyelination/remyelination - Sensory ataxia - Steppage gait - Ulnar claw - Variable expressivity - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
